text: these bright drops seem to be playing a
lively game of tag the drops are just
water and food coloring of which a main
ingredient is propylene glycol drops of
different colors contain different
amounts as it turns out complicated
interactions between water vapor and
surface tension caused the drops to
chase each other as two nearby drops
start to evaporate the space between
them has higher humidity so they each
evaporate less water on that side higher
humidity also means greater surface
tension which pulls the drops together
when the drops get so close they can
almost touch things get really
interesting propylene glycol has a lower
surface tension than water so of two
differently colored drops one will have
higher surface tension than the other
that pushes it away the other drop
follows and the chase is on based on
this discovery researchers have created
fluid machines that can drive the dots
around courses and sort them by color or
concentration
